name: THE CHAR​​GE
description:
Five to ten minute playable demo presenting one complete level of THE CHA☈GE, a poetic riddle-based mind game in four episodes in search of executive function.

Gameplay: Single click on icons / buttons. SPACE or RETURN to skip the boring stuff. ESC to close dialogues and navigate menus. Best played fullscreen. 

Playable on mobile (landscape orientation recommended).
